channel.title: CVE Feed for SiAdmin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SiAdmin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4991|2024-08-01T20:55:10.445Z -- siadmin -- siadmin
item.description: Vulnerability in SiAdmin 1.1 that allows SQL injection via the /modul/mod_pass/aksi_pass.php parameter in nama_lengkap. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the system and retrieve all the information stored in it.

item.title: CVE-2024-4992|2024-08-01T20:55:10.415Z -- siadmin -- siadmin
item.description: Vulnerability in SiAdmin 1.1 that allows SQL injection via the /modul/mod_kuliah/aksi_kuliah.php parameter in nim. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the system and retrieve all the information stored in it.

item.title: CVE-2024-4993|2024-08-01T20:55:10.414Z -- siadmin -- siadmin
item.description: Vulnerability in SiAdmin 1.1 that allows XSS via the /show.php query parameter. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted URL to an authenticated user and thereby steal their cookie session credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-4993|2024-06-04T17:54:11.718Z -- siadmin -- siadmin
item.description: Vulnerability in SiAdmin 1.1 that allows XSS via the /show.php query parameter. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted URL to an authenticated user and thereby steal their cookie session credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-4992|2024-06-04T17:54:32.192Z -- siadmin -- siadmin
item.description: Vulnerability in SiAdmin 1.1 that allows SQL injection via the /modul/mod_kuliah/aksi_kuliah.php parameter in nim. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the system and retrieve all the information stored in it.

item.title: CVE-2024-4991|2024-06-04T17:55:14.642Z -- siadmin -- siadmin
item.description: Vulnerability in SiAdmin 1.1 that allows SQL injection via the /modul/mod_pass/aksi_pass.php parameter in nama_lengkap. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the system and retrieve all the information stored in it.
